comments.text: set name to Mise à jour ABS MAANGEMENT.RESSOURCES.EAD
set name to Mise à jour ABS MANAGEMENT.RESSOURCES.EAD
set name to Mise à jour ABS PMO

kpis.name: Deliver On Budget
kpis.description:
This indicator shows us our performance to be in our budget engagement. It is the proportion of previsionnal workload on real workload. Value of 100% is better.

  • Lower means overcost or underestimation of budget
  • Higher means undercost or overestimation of budget
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the number of task is meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Determinate accurately the affected peremiter
  • Review the root causes that affects your budget

kpis.name: Actor Satisfaction
kpis.description: Understanding actors about motivation and job satisfaction will help us offer better deliverables and services every day. Are you satisfied with yout daily task envirnoment ? Do you enjoy the workplace culture and feel aligned with your organization’s goals? Higher value is better.
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review with the actor what were his expectations to realize his task
  • Review with the actor how to better define and explicit these expectations for next deliverables

kpis.name: Confidence Overview
kpis.description: Percentage of confidence to execute task with respect in terms of quality, cost, time. Higher value is better.
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review with the customer what were his expectations in quality, cost or schedule
  • Review with the customer how to better define and explicit these expectations for next deliverables

kpis.name: Deliver In Full
kpis.description: Percentage of orders which all of the items are received by customer in the quantities committed. Higher value is better.
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review with the customer what were his expectations in quality, cost or schedule
  • Review with the customer how to better define and explicit these expectations for next deliverables

kpis.name: External Defect Prevention
kpis.description: To err is human but defect prevention practices enhance the ability to learn from those errors and, in this case, learn from the mistakes of external actors. Higher value is better. See full description on Help tab & KPI Section
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review the communication with the project team and upper management to be sure to be agree on the same deliverable
  • Review the preparation phase to be sure to not forget things that force you to rework the task (prerequisite list)

kpis.name: Internal Defect Prevention
kpis.description: To err is human but defect prevention practices enhance the ability to learn from those errors and, in this case, learn from our internal mistakes . Higher value is better. See full description on Help tab & KPI Section
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review the validation phase to be sure of the quality of the deliverable (Quality Checks)

kpis.name: User Satisfaction
kpis.description: Understanding our customers and clients will help us offer better deliverables and services every day. Do customers feel like you offer value and quality? Higher value is better.
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review with the customer what were his expectations in quality, cost or schedule
  • Review with the customer how to better define and explicit these expectations for next deliverables

kpis.name: Deliver On Time
kpis.description: This indicator shows us our performance to be on time about our engagement and prevision about timeline. It is the proportion of tasks that has been delivered on time. Higher value is better.
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the number of delayed task is meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Determinate accurately the affected peremiter 
  • Review the root causes that affects your delivery timing

kpis.name: Effective Cycle Time
kpis.description:
Production Time adjusted for all the factors that reduce Work Time Available and Productivity : Interruptions, Multi-tasking, Task zapping. Higher value is better.

  • Lower means Interruptions, Multi-tasking, Task zapping for actors
  • Higher means capacity to put multiple actors in parallel on a same task
kpis.suggestion:
Assess if the value is low and meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review the planning to reduce the number of multiple tasks to an actor
  • Review the preparation phase to be sure to not forget things that force you to interrupt the task (prerequisite list)

alerts.name: Predicted OverCharge
alerts.description: This alert indicates that if the dynamic of the task remains the same, the final workload will be superior as target one.Value 0 is better.
alerts.suggestion:
Assess if the delta is meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review if the new workload is compatible with your planning
  • Review if the new workload is compatible with the planning or budget of the project
  • Assess if the new workload is acceptable (if not, review acceptables deliverables), if yes, adjust budget planning of project and yours

alerts.name: Delivery Overdue
alerts.description: This alert indicates that if the dynamic of the task remains the same, the final workload will be superior as target one.Value 0 is better.
alerts.suggestion:
Assess if the delta is meaningfull (if not, do nothing), if yes, please :

  • Review if the new workload is compatible with your planning
  • Review if the new workload is compatible with the planning or budget of the project
  • Assess if the new workload is acceptable (if not, review acceptables deliverables), if yes, adjust budget planning of project and yours
